resources.string: Q: What does this app do?
Q: How can I share data?\nWhat can I share?
Q: Can I use one RuuviTag for multiple spaces?
Q: I have another question or have feedback/bug issue.

A: In this app, you can add spaces of any area, for example your kitchen, balcony and summer cottage, individually measure circumstance data (temperature, air pressure and humidity) from them and share them among other users.

A: Start by adding spaces from the spaces page. After that, head to measure page and choose which space to measure from. A RuuviTag measuring device is used to measure conditions of selected space. You must add one to each space by clicking the Bluetooth Icon on spaces page or measure page.

A: Head to the measure page. There, you can see your properties and select a space from a property. Select a clock symbol from the space list. Add a schedule and when the scheduled measurement is done, click on the finished schedule to get the results. There you can share the results from the top bar\'s share symbol.
A: Yes. However, note that you can\'t save data from two spaces that use the same device at the same time.
